<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Permission Accesses</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v1/permission/access"}></MethodEndpoint>



Given a permission ID and an 
[IAM query](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/prisma-cloud-rql-reference/rql-reference/iam-query.html),
returns data about the actual permission usage (last access).


The request parameter **limit** determines the number of items&mdash;that is, last access&mdash;in the response object. 


If the amount of available data is greater than the 
specified **limit**, use the response object attribute **data.nextPageToken** as the request parameter **pageToken** in 
[Get Permissions Access Next Page](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/get-next-permissions-access-with-post) to request the
next page of data.
